welcome.p: Do more with your notes and sketches.
entity.group.name: Group Name
setupDevice.title: Setup Device
setupDevice.description: Let's get you setup to use paper for sketching or notes
saveChanges.title: Do you want to save changes?
saveChanges.description: Your changes will be lost if you don't save them.
setupLater.title: Setup later?
setupLater.description: You can setup your device at any time in the Inkspace app Settings menu.
orientation.title: Choose orientation
orientation.description: Select the position of your device when using paper
cloudLogin.title: Do more with your notes and sketches
cloudLogin.description: Login or create your Wacom ID and unlock additional free Inkspace features.
logout.title: Sign out
logout.confirm.description: Your local notes will be deleted. Are you sure you want to continue?
logout.syncing.confirm.description: Some of your content is being synced at the moment. Signing out might lead to data loss. Are you sure you want to continue?
session.expired.title: Session Expired
session.expired.description: Your session has expired. Please login again.
unlockFeaturesLater.title: Unlock free Inkspace features later?
unlockFeaturesLater.description: You can unlock these features later by logging in or setting up your Wacom ID in the Inkspace app Settings menu.
finished.title: Finished
noSupportedDevice.title: No supported device found
noSupportedDevice.description: No connection was established. Please, repeat the current step.
noSupportedDevice.viper.description: Connect Wacom Intuos Pro with the USB cable
live.mode.waiting.usb.title: Plug in your USB cable
live.mode.waiting.usb.description: Plug in USB cable and start writing in Live Mode
live.mode.waiting.btc.title: Turn on your device
live.mode.waiting.btc.description: Turn on your device and start writing in Live Mode
live.mode.waiting.ble.title: Tap to connect
live.mode.waiting.ble.description: Tap on the device button to establish connection and start writing in Live Mode
exportingNote.title: Preparing Document...
exportingVideo.title: Preparing Video...
confirm.title: Confirm
confirm.remove.tag.title: Delete tag
confirm.remove.tag.description: Are you sure that you want to delete permanently this tag?
confirm.remove.note.title: Delete note
confirm.remove.note.description: Are you sure that you want to delete permanently this note/notes?
empty.tags.title: No Tags
empty.tags.description: Once you create tags they will appear here
library.empty.tags.filter.title: No Match
library.empty.tags.filter.description: There is no content associated with the selected tag
pairDevice.description: Lets connect your device to your computer first.
btcl.setupLater.title: Connect your device later?
btcl.setupLater.description: You can setup your device later in the app Settings.
selectConnection.title: Select connection
selectConnection.description: Choose Bluetooth to pair your Intuos Pro, or attach USB to connect via cable.
switchOn.title: Switch on
pressAndHold.title: Press and hold
pressAndHold.description: Press and hold the button for 6 seconds to put the device into Bluetooth discovery mode. The LED will blink blue.
pressAndHold.searching.description: Press and hold the center button till the device starts blinking and then click connect.
acceptBTC.title: Accept Bluetooth connection
acceptBTC.description: Click on the system configuration to accept the Bluetooth connection
selectDevice.title: Select device
selectDevice.description: If this is the correct device select "Pair", if it is not select "Try again"
pair.selected.device.title: Pair select device
pair.selected.device.description: If this is the correct device select "Pair", if not select "Try again"
selectDeviceType.title: Select your device
remove.group.title: Remove Group
remove.group.description: Do you want to remove only the group or delete the pages as well?
btn.search.title: Search
btInstructions.title: Do the following steps:
btInstructions.press.button: Press and hold the center button on your tablet for 6 seconds
btInstructions.le.warning: Make sure you selected the one without "LE" in the name
btInstructions.come.back.with.next: When done, come back and click next
forgetDevice.title: Forget Device
forgetDevice.description: Do you want to forget your currently connected device?
tapToConfirm.title: Tap to confirm
tapToConfirm.description: Tap on the center button to confirm
connectionLost.title: Connection lost
connectionLost.description: Repeat the step to pair your Smartpad device
addCustomName.title: Add custom name
addCustomName.description: To easily recognize your device on next pairing
downloadProceed.title: Download proceeding
downloadProceed.description: If you close Wacom Inkspace App while download proceed, your notes will be lost.
export.limit.reached.title: Limit reached
export.limit.reached.description: The maximum amount of 40 notes have been exceeded. Please, reduce the amount of the selected notes and try again.
plus.title: Move your ideas further
plus.storage.title: 50GB Storage
plus.sync.title: Sync on Multiple Devices
plus.text.title: Ink to Text
plus.video.title: Ink to Video
plus.export.title: More Export Formats
plus.tag.title: Ink to Tag
plus.web.title: Access from anywhere
plus.tags.title: Inkspace Tags
plus.collaboration.title: Realtime Collaboration
tutorial.viper.step.one.title: Attach clip and paper
tutorial.viper.step.one.desc: Attach the clip to your Intuos Pro and place paper as shown.
tutorial.viper.step.two.title: Bring Ink pen on paper
tutorial.viper.step.two.desc: To switch to paper mode, hover Wacom Intuos Pro ink pen above paper.
tutorial.viper.step.three.title: Green LED
tutorial.viper.step.three.desc: During paper mode, green LED appears on the center button.
tutorial.viper.step.four.title: Write or sketch
tutorial.viper.step.four.desc: LED will change to blue when you write or sketch.
tutorial.viper.step.five.title: Press button when finish
tutorial.viper.step.five.desc: LED will change to green to indicate new page.
tutorial.viper.step.six.title: See Sketch in library
tutorial.viper.step.six.desc: Your Sketches will be in your library when transfer is completed.
tutorial.columbia.step.one.title: Write or sketch
tutorial.columbia.step.one.desc: LED will change to blue when you write or sketch
tutorial.columbia.step.two.title: Press button when finish
tutorial.columbia.step.two.desc: LED will change to green to indicate new page
tutorial.columbia.step.three.title: See sketch in library
tutorial.columbia.step.three.desc: Your sketches will be in your library when transfer is completed
settings.inkspace.notlogged: You are not logged in to Wacom Inkspace Portal
settings.device.name: Device Name
settings.device.change.name: Change device name
settings.device.not.connected: There is no Wacom device connected
settings.about.title: Wacom Inkspace
settings.about.desc: Copyright © 2017 - {currentYear} Wacom Company, Limited. All rights reserved.
notification.livemode.info: During Live Mode everything you write on paper will be mirrored on the screen.
notification.note.differentSizes.notComb: Pages with different sizes and orientations cannot be combined
notification.newDevice.connected: New device connected. Please pair the new through settings.
notification.tutorial.availableInMenuBar: Tutorial is available within the Menu Bar.
notification.device.not.recognized: Your device has been connected to another application. Please, pair again.
notification.device.restore.connection: Tap the button to restore the connection
notification.do.not.unplug.device: Please do not unplug USB while download is in progress
system.menu.app.name: Inkspace
premium.feature.disabled.dialog: To enable this feature, you must upgrade your Inkspace plan.
layerpane.thumb.layer.title: Layer {index}
empty.group.details: You can add pages from the Library view:
empty.group.subdetails.drag.drop: drag and drop a page to this group in Groups list
empty.group.subdetails.context.menu: right-click a page to access the Groups list in the context menu
live.mode.not.allowed.while.downloading: Live mode is not allowed while downloading notes!
notification.no.device.pairing.while.not: Please wait for file download to finish before starting a new pairing!
notification.no.device.actions.while.not: Please wait for file download to finish before start processing with device!
notification.no.live.mode.while.note.tra: Please wait for file download to finish before starting the live mode!
exportAsText.title: Export as text
server.error: An error occurred. Please, try again.
server.notAuthorized: You are not authorized to execute this action
